honors_and_awards.honor: Society of collegiate leadership and acheivement

projects.title: Give2Go
descr: Led development of Give2Go, a trip fundraising network addressing financial barriers for 6,000+ Cru students, by leveraging AI tools to accelerate prototyping and prioritize system design during a one-week sprint

Built a recursive group donation algorithm with adjustable distribution bias to enable strategic donor flexibility and to reduce student fundraising time by 30%, then deployed the MVP on Vercel and Render

projects.title: eCommerce App
descr: Built a Ruby on Rails eCommerce site with user authentication, Stripe payments, back-in-stock email notifications, and search functionality, mimicking production-quality financial transactions at scale

projects.title: Diagonal Sums
descr: Designed a C program to compute diagonal sums in large integer datasets, implementing system calls for file I/O, dynamic memory management, and parallel processing with POSIX multithreading
